Nick: This sounds like something related to the RCP changes.  Can you comment?
TextEditorActionContributor is in org.eclipse.ui.editors, which is the IDE 
layer of the Text component.  So it's OK to refer to this group.
Ed, I'm closing this as WORKSFORME since you're referring to an ID at the IDE 
layer.  Please reopen and provide more details if you think otherwise.
Ok. If you assume org.eclipse.ui.editors is at the IDE layer then yes, it 
should be able to make assumptions about groups added by the 
IDEWorkbenchAdvisor so it's not a problem.

I would argue that org.eclipse.ui.editors should not be at the IDE layer 
because editing a file is not intrinsically a development environment concept. 
But, I believe that's already covered by a different bugzilla entry.
